title: CMC-Based Learning Design and Assessment Strategies for Female Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Technology-Based Educational Environments and Formative Assessment Methods
context.additional_context: Participants are professionals with extensive experience in social interaction and learner-centered design but have concerns about assessment methods in digital environments.

learning_goals: Participants explain how to design learner-centered interactions using CMC tools
Develop strategies to measure learner engagement by applying formative assessment tools in simulation environments
Recognize power imbalance issues in technology-based learning processes and propose alternative evaluation methods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
